#compile.

= Introduction =

Must be compiled with lua 5.1.x .
Should be compiled in any environment that lua supports.

I have tested compiling in generic linux-2.6, windows mingw, windows vs2008.


= Details =

mingw32:
{{{
 cd lua-5.1.4
 cd src
 mingw32-make mingw
 cd luadec
 mingw32-make
}}}

linux:
{{{
 cd lua-5.1.4
 cd src
 make linux
 cd luadec
 make
}}}
